Django import / export¶

django-import-export is django application and library for importing and exporting data.

Features:

  • support multiple formats (Excel, CSV, JSON, ... and everything else that tablib support)
  • admin integration for importing data with preview of import changes
  • admin intrgration for exporting data respecting admin filters
